title: How to Make S'more Hot Chocolate

steps.headline: In a pot on medium heat, mix the condensed milk, whole milk, sugar, cocoa powder, chocolate and vanilla extract.
Whisk until the chocolate melts and the mixture is smooth.
Crumble the graham crackers by placing them in a plastic bag and whacking it with a wooden spoon.
Pour the crumbled graham crackers on a plate.
Wet the rims of two mugs and roll the rims on the crackers.
Pour the hot chocolate into two mugs.
Garnish with whipped cream, chopped chocolate, marshmallows, and extra graham crackers.

text: In a pot on medium heat, mix the condensed milk, whole milk, sugar, cocoa powder, chocolate and vanilla extract.  Whisk until the chocolate melts and the mixture is smooth.  Shut the stove off.  Crumble the graham crackers by placing them in a plastic bag and whacking it with a wooden spoon.  Pour the crumbled graham crackers on a plate.  Wet the rims of two mugs and roll the rims on the crackers.  Pour the hot chocolate into two mugs.  Garnish with whipped cream, chopped chocolate, marshmallows, and extra graham crackers.  Enjoy!
